login.title: Welcome back

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noWorkoutsMessage: No completed workouts yet. Complete your first workout to see it here!

summary.title: Workout Summary
summary.mentalReadinessTitle: How did you feel mentally during this workout?
summary.mentalReadinessDescription: This helps us understand your overall mental state and optimize future workouts
summary.notesDescription: Did you experience any pain? Technique issues? Preferences on exercises or recovery? Share your observations here to improve your future workouts.
summary.notesPlaceholder: E.g., I felt a slight pain in my left shoulder during the Military Press. I prefer to use dumbbells for Chest Press...
summary.mentalReadinessRequired: Please select your mental state before completing the workout
